name: SillyHaikus
0:
”Alexa, ask Silly Haikus to read me a haiku”
”Alexa, tell Silly Haikus to read us a poem”
”Alexa, ask Silly Haikus to give me a haiku”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: silly haikus
des:
Having a long day? When asked, this skill will read you an inane and silly haiku on topics ranging from the weather to making dinner and programming. It's a great way to add some humor and lightheartedness to your day.

You won't need anything additional to use the skill - simply ask Silly Haikus to read you a haiku, and Alexa will read your short poem for you.

You can ask Silly Haikus to "read me a haiku" or "read us a poem" and you'll get a fun response.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
